exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: A full-body exercise that can be done anywhere. Jump while spreading legs and raising arms overhead, then return to starting position.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: A cardio-intensive exercise performed in place. Run in place while lifting knees as high as possible.

exercises.name: Arm Circles
exercises.description: Stand with arms extended to the sides. Make small circular motions, gradually increasing the size.

exercises.name: Butt Kicks
exercises.description: Run in place while kicking heels up towards your glutes. This dynamic movement warms up the hamstrings and increases heart rate.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: Start in plank position. Alternate driving knees towards chest in a running motion. Great for cardio and core activation.

exercises.name: Windmill
exercises.description: Stand with feet wide, arms extended. Bend at waist and rotate torso, touching opposite hand to foot. Mobilizes spine and hamstrings.

exercises.name: Hip Circles
exercises.description: Stand on one leg or hands and knees. Make large circular motions with your hip joint to increase mobility and warm up hip flexors.

exercises.name: Half Middle Split (HMS Lunges)
exercises.description: Start in a wide stance. Shift weight from side to side in a lunge position to stretch inner thighs and hips.

exercises.name: Walking Pike
exercises.description: Start in plank, walk hands back towards feet keeping legs straight, then walk hands forward. Stretches hamstrings and warms up shoulders.

exercises.name: Core Engagements - Floor
exercises.description: Lie on back, lift legs and shoulders off ground while engaging core. Hold briefly and release. Activates deep core muscles.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower hips back and down as if sitting in a chair, then return to standing.

exercises.name: Relevé
exercises.description: Rise up onto the balls of your feet, lifting heels as high as possible. Strengthens calves and improves ankle stability.

exercises.name: Half Wood Chopper
exercises.description: Stand with feet wide. Rotate torso while bringing arms diagonally across body in a chopping motion. Warms up obliques and spine.

exercises.name: Hand Kicks
exercises.description: Stand and kick one leg up while reaching opposite hand toward the foot. Improves hamstring flexibility and coordination.

exercises.name: Hamstring Stretch (Lying Down)
exercises.description: Lie on back, raise one leg and pull it toward chest using hands or a strap. Gently stretch the hamstring.

exercises.name: Lunge Step (with High Knee)
exercises.description: Step forward into a lunge, then drive the back knee up explosively. Combines strength and dynamic movement.

exercises.name: Plank Skiing
exercises.description: In plank position, jump both feet side to side together like a skier. Engages core and builds cardiovascular endurance.

exercises.name: Deep Plié
exercises.description: Stand with feet wide and toes turned out. Lower down into a deep squat, keeping chest lifted. Targets inner thighs and glutes.

exercises.name: Half Split Push Outs
exercises.description: In a half split position, push hips back and forth to dynamically stretch hamstrings and hip flexors.

exercises.name: Assisted 1-Legged Pike Stretch
exercises.description: Sit with one leg extended. Fold forward over the extended leg, reaching toward the foot to stretch hamstrings.

exercises.name: Leg Swings (Standing)
exercises.description: Hold onto a wall or bar. Swing one leg forward and back in a controlled manner to warm up hip flexors and hamstrings.

exercises.name: Burpee
exercises.description: From standing, drop into a squat, kick feet back to plank, do a push-up, jump feet back to squat, then jump up. Full-body conditioning.

exercises.name: Rocking Boat
exercises.description: Sit in a V-sit position with legs and torso lifted. Rock back and forth in a controlled manner to engage core and improve balance.

exercises.name: Seated Hip Rotations
exercises.description: Sit on the floor with knees bent. Rotate knees side to side to mobilize hips and lower back.

exercises.name: Runner's Stretch (Active)
exercises.description: In a low lunge position, pulse forward and back to actively stretch hip flexors and quads of the back leg.

exercises.name: Core Engagements (Tuck)
exercises.description: From a hollow body position, pull knees to chest in a tight tuck, then extend back out. Advanced core control exercise.

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.description: A gentle stretch to warm up the spine. On hands and knees, alternate between arching back (cow) and rounding spine (cat).

exercises.name: Wrist Rotations
exercises.description: Rotate wrists in both directions to prepare them for weight-bearing exercises.

exercises.name: Wall Slides
exercises.description: An exercise to improve shoulder mobility and posture. Stand against wall, slide arms up and down while keeping contact with wall.

exercises.name: Shoulder Dislocates
exercises.description: Hold a band or stick with wide grip. Keeping arms straight, rotate it from front to back over your head.

exercises.name: Band Pull-Aparts
exercises.description: Hold resistance band at chest level. Pull hands apart, squeezing shoulder blades together.

exercises.name: Wall Handstand Hold
exercises.description: Hold a handstand against a wall to build strength and endurance. Focus on maintaining hollow body position.

exercises.name: Handstand Shoulder Taps
exercises.description: In a wall handstand, carefully tap alternating shoulders while maintaining balance.

exercises.name: Chest-to-Wall Handstand
exercises.description: Face the wall in handstand position. This variation emphasizes proper alignment and balance.

exercises.name: Handstand Walk (Wall)
exercises.description: In wall handstand, walk hands side to side to build coordination and strength.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: A core strength exercise that involves maintaining a position similar to a push-up for the maximum possible time.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Classic upper body exercise. Lower body to ground and push back up, keeping core tight.

exercises.name: Pike Push-ups
exercises.description: Start in downward dog position. Lower head to ground, focusing on shoulder strength.

exercises.name: Hollow Body Hold
exercises.description: Lie on back, press lower back to ground, lift shoulders and legs. This builds core strength for handstands.

exercises.name: Wrist Stretch
exercises.description: A stretch to improve flexibility and prevent injury in the wrists. Extend arm and gently pull fingers back.

exercises.name: Shoulder Stretch
exercises.description: Pull one arm across body using the other arm. Hold to stretch the shoulder.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.description: Sit back on heels with arms extended forward on the ground. Great for shoulder and back relaxation.

exercises.name: Bridge Stretch
exercises.description: Lie on back, lift hips up while keeping shoulders on ground. Great for spine and shoulder flexibility.
